favourite.article: Dear saints who is laboring in the love of our Father God and His Son Jesus Christ and in the fellowship of the Holy Spirit. Thank you so very much for this simple and pure sacred music. I have been searching through youtub for number of years and never been so happy. I have found the music that truly belongs the kingdom of the Lord. This music is so simple and pure; no mixtures, no contaminations of worldly and fleshly feelings. This music brings me into the realm of the Triune God. May the Lord continue to bless you all who are laboring in this work. May the God of comfort, comfort your spirit, mind, emotion, and will and body; as your music ministers to us with the life and love of God, our Father. Amen, forever and ever. God bless you richly. Amen.
